text: It's Garry Shandling's Show is an American sitcom. It is about the everyday life of Garry Shandling (portraying a fictionalized version of himself). It aired from 1986-1990. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1986 American television series debuts Category:1990 American television series endings Category:1980s American television series Category:1990s American television series Category:American sitcoms Category:English-language television programs
title: It's Garry Shandling's Show
